Name: required_feature_status
Description: Feature must be in progress or done

Name: required_sprint_status
Description: Sprint must be completed or active

Name: required_user_story_status
Description: User story must not be rejected

Name: required_role_area
Description: Role must be in development or QA area

Name: required_blocker_severity
Description: Only high or medium severity blockers allowed

Name: required_planned_release
Description: Release must be in planned status

Name: required_board_update
Description: Scrum board must be updated daily

Name: required_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Stakeholder must be relevant to current feature
